TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MediaMetadataRetriever extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: MediaMetadataRetriever class provides a unified interface for retrieving frame and meta data from an input media file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Graphics.Bitmap GetFrameAtTime(int64 timeUs) cil managed
abstract member GetFrameAtTime : int64 -> Android.Graphics.Bitmap override this.GetFrameAtTime : int64 -> Android.Graphics.Bitmap

Docs.param: The time position where the frame will be retrieved. When retrieving the frame at the given time position, there is no guarentee that the data source has a frame located at the position. When this happens, a frame nearby will be returned. If timeUs is negative, time position and option will ignored, and any frame that the implementation considers as representative may be returned.
Docs.summary: Call this method after setDataSource().

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Android.Graphics.Bitmap GetFrameAtTime (long timeUs, Android.Media.Option option);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Graphics.Bitmap GetFrameAtTime(int64 timeUs, valuetype Android.Media.Option option) cil managed
abstract member GetFrameAtTime : int64 * Android.Media.Option -> Android.Graphics.Bitmap override this.GetFrameAtTime : int64 * Android.Media.Option -> Android.Graphics.Bitmap

Docs.param: The time position where the frame will be retrieved. When retrieving the frame at the given time position, there is no guarantee that the data source has a frame located at the position. When this happens, a frame nearby will be returned. If timeUs is negative, time position and option will ignored, and any frame that the implementation considers as representative may be returned.

a hint on how the frame is found. Use if one wants to retrieve a sync frame that has a timestamp earlier than or the same as timeUs. Use if one wants to retrieve a sync frame that has a timestamp later than or the same as timeUs. Use if one wants to retrieve a sync frame that has a timestamp closest to or the same as timeUs. Use if one wants to retrieve a frame that may or may not be a sync frame but is closest to or the same as timeUs. often has larger performance overhead compared to the other options if there is no sync frame located at timeUs.
Docs.summary: Call this method after setDataSource().

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.Option OptionClosest = (3)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.Option enum directly instead of this field.")

Docs.summary: This option is used with to retrieve a frame (not necessarily a key frame) associated with a data source that is located closest to or at the given time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.Option OptionClosestSync = (2)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.Option enum directly instead of this field.")

Docs.summary: This option is used with to retrieve a sync (or key) frame associated with a data source that is located closest to (in time) or at the given time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.Option OptionNextSync = (1)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.Option enum directly instead of this field.")

Docs.summary: This option is used with to retrieve a sync (or key) frame associated with a data source that is located right after or at the given time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.Option OptionPreviousSync = (0)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.Option enum directly instead of this field.")

Docs.summary: This option is used with to retrieve a sync (or key) frame associated with a data source that is located right before or at the given time.
